high_risk_indicators: Current suicidal ideation with plan and intent
moderate_risk_indicators: Suicidal ideation without specific plan or intent
Recent major loss or negative life event

response_protocol.high_risk: Immediate intervention required. Contact emergency services.
response_protocol.moderate_risk: Safety planning, frequent check-ins, consider referral to crisis services.
response_protocol.low_risk: Continue monitoring, ensure follow-up care and support resources.
